title: #38: Secrets of the Church | Eric Gajewski of Trad Cat Knight
description:
There is an old saying that if God did not exist, then it would be necessary for Man to invent him. So did humans invent God, or is it the other way around?

Eric Gajewski is the voice behind Trad Cat Knight, one of the most popular traditional Catholic podcasts on the internet, and he steps in to help us to understand what is currently happening inside the church, and why it should matter to us.

Catholic prophecy is the thing of legends, so are we destined for salvation...or headed towards the end of days? It sure seems like 2020 is the year of the apocalypse, but what does the church have to say about where we are heading?
